document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Men </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Women </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Shadows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">walk </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Hills </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Today </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">here </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">mighty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Bow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">trailing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Courtesy </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Neighbors </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">doubtless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">quickened </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">perceive </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Minuter </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">landscape </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ourselves </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9490ff">Boroughs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">live </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Like men and women shadows walk
